## Examples

```js
<table cellpadding={10}>
    <tr>
        <th>Last Login</th>
        <td><FieldFormatter record={testData.user} fieldName="lastLogin" /></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <th>Email</th>
        <td><FieldFormatter record={testData.user} fieldName="email" /></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <th>Is Staff</th>
        <td><FieldFormatter record={testData.user} fieldName="isStaff" /></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <th>Permissions</th>
        <td><FieldFormatter record={testData.user} fieldName="userPermissions" /></td>
    </tr>
</table>
```
